'''Sea Breeze Dandelion''' is a [[Discount Event]] in [[Version 1.6]].

==Discount Period==
* 2021-06-09 11:00:00 UTC+8 - 2021-07-19 03:59:59

==Outfit Details==
* [[Jean]]'s outfit "[[Sea Breeze Dandelion]]" will be permanently available in the [[Shop]] after the [[Version 1.6]] update.
* The price of the outfit after discount is 1,350 [[Genesis Crystals]]. The price will revert to 1,680 Genesis Crystals after the limited-time discount ends. The outfit can only be purchased once.
* The outfit can be viewed in [[Character]] > [[Dressing Room]] > [[Character Outfit|Outfit]] after purchase.
* Travelers who do not have Jean can still purchase the outfit, which can be viewed in the [[Character Archive]] after purchase.
